channel.title: 1 problem ... {pi}
channel.description:
hi, i havnt posted in a while :D so i thought id post a problem well 2 actually
when i added a ::vote command the site didnt show up
and also
can i add a command that allows me to add item to shops ?
like a command say
::additem (shop npc id) (item id) (amount) ?
- oo just thought also how do i take out walls and doors i tried the -1 ,xxxx,yyyy that didnt work
